quote_last: Yep, Jack Cermakâ€™s Corner Tap was the eighth circle of hell. In a gentrifying neighborhood like Logan Square, setting up a sanitized, overpriced bar to look like a cheap small-town dive was just plain sick.
title: Kitchens of the Great Midwest
author: J. Ryan Stradal
